pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 14, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, April 14, 2016:

London, Ontario

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Fanshawe College's Centre for Applied Transportation Technologies and hold a media availability.

Fanshawe College
1764 Oxford St. E
London, ON

Notes for Media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m. for accreditation
  • Media should enter through the north west entrance of the building


Guelph, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will tour Magna Polycon Industries.

Magna Polycon Industries
65 Independence Place
Guelph, ON               

Notes for Media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 1:15 p.m. for accreditation
  • Photo opportunity only


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
